description: When the OpenStack API is being used with the v1.0 endpoint, it should return cloudServersFault, not computeFault, when an 'unknown error' occurs.  computeFault is not defined in the CloudServers API v1.0.
title: OpenStack API v1.0 sends computeFault, not cloudServersFault

comments.content: When the OpenStack API is being used with the v1.0 endpoint, it should return cloudServersFault, not computeFault, when an 'unknown error' occurs.  computeFault is not defined in the CloudServers API v1.0.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~justin-fathomdb
